products.title: Infusion Asc Beige Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion Asc Fr Beige
products.description: Infusion asc fr perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. The flame retardant coating also makes it suitable for contract applications. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc fr beige available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Infusion Solar Beige Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar beige pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0008 fabric colour: beige headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
